sentence.text: Intriguingly, five CPGs showed concordance between CNL and down-regulation in 50 or more tumor samples: nicotinamide riboside catabolic process (216 samples), negative regulation of protein phosphorylation (143), negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II (86), transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway (63), and polyphosphate metabolic process (51), which may represent the recurrent driving force for gene expression change during oncogenesis.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
